bad_credentials: Unable to log in with provided credentials

login.unique: This station ID already exists, please choose another one
login.regex: Invalid value, please use Lating characters and digits only. Special characters are not allowed

domain.wrong_ip_resolved: Failed to obtain an IP address for this domain, check that the DNS is configured correctly and the domain is linked to the server IP address
domain.wrong_ip: The domain is assigned to a different IP address, configure the DNS so that this domain points to the server’s IP address

ip.ssh_port_connection_failed: SSH connection failed, check connection parameters
ip.wrong_os: Unsupported OS, please see the list of supported operating systems above

radio_wizard.failed: There were errors when creating the radio

self_hosted.title: Self-hosted
self_hosted.help: The best option for most users, with no limits on the number of listeners or disk space. You can use any hosting provider. In this plan we do not require any documents confirming the legality of broadcasting.
self_hosted.description: To install our software, the server must be completely clean and have no other control panels, databases or websites installed.
self_hosted.ip_hint: IP address of your dedicated or virtual server. The server mush have no other control panels or software installed.
self_hosted.include_installation_hint: Installation is done by our qualified engineer.
self_hosted.server_domain_hint: Optional. This domain name will be attached to your web interface URL. Domain name is required is you want SSL encryption for HTTPS stream links.
self_hosted.root_username_hint: root or sudo user. root-level access to your server is required
self_hosted.install_command: To install the software, run this command in the server terminal and follow the installation script instructions

hosted.title: Hosted at Streaming.center
hosted.help: The number of listeners, quality and disk space are charged. You will need to provide documents confirming the legality of the broadcast.
hosted.legal_1: I will provide the necessary documents
hosted.legal_1_help: You will have 5 days to send us documents
hosted.legal_2: I will not use copyrighted content.
hosted.legal_2_help: If you break the rules, your account will be blocked without the possibility of a refund.
hosted.legal_3_help: You can test the operation of the radio control panel without installation on your server for 5 days.
hosted.station_id_hint: Latin characters and digits only, special characters are not allowed.
hosted.station_url: You can assign a different domain later, by default your station URL will be

self_hosted.title: Self hosted radios
self_hosted.empty: You do not have any self hosted radios yet

hosted.title: Hosted radios
hosted.empty: You do not have any radios hosted by us yet

radios.delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this radio?
radios.delete_failed: Failed to remove this radio, try again later or contact support.
radios.delete_success: The radio has been removed successfully

password_reset.check_inbox_email: An email as been sent to
password_reset.check_inbox_hint_text: We can only senf password reset instructions to registered emails with an existing account. If the email doesn't appear in your inbox or spam folder, please check email you entered or click below to send a new email.
password_reset.done_title: Account password has been changed successfully!
password_reset.done_text: You can now login using your updated password.
password_reset.token_is_invalid_text: Failed to reset your password. This most likely happened because the password reset link was no longer valid. Try repeating the password reset procedure using the button below

email.user_not_found: We do not have an account with such email address

settings.title: Account settings
settings.save_success: Account settings have been saved successfully

email.unique: Email address is already in use

invoice_request.title: Request an invoice by email
invoice_request.internation_payment_hint: Works for international payments, you can pay with your card
invoice_request.looking: We are looking for new available payment methods to make fees lower
invoice_request.amount_hint: The amount (excluding the payment service fee) will be credited to your account and you will be able to use these funds to pay for services
invoice_request.invoice_request_accepted: Invoice request accepted. We will send you an invoice by email
invoice_request.invoice_request_failed: Failed to submit invoice request, please contact support or try again later
invoice_request.hint: We will send you an invoice to this email.

apps.price_description: One-time payment, no recurring charges. You you want additional custom features in your application - please contact us, the price may change according to your requirements
apps.title: Mobile application for your radio
apps.description: Allows you to significantly expand your listeners audience. The application can be created both for radios built using our platform or for any others that is using Shoutcast or Icecast protocol.
apps.android_empty: You do not have any Android applications yet
apps.ios_empty: You do not have any iOS applications yet

publishing.title: Publishing settings
publishing.description: To make your application available publicly you need to publish it in an application store - Apple App Store for iOs applications and Google Play for Android (we also provide other stores for Android per request).
publishing.sc: I do not have a developer account, please publish using your Streaming.center developer account
publishing.other: I will provide my developer account credentials for publishing
publishing.no: No need to publish, I just need application APK file

copyright.title: Copyright settings
copyright.description: Application has a coppyright link to your project on the "Info" page. You can keep our original copyright or use a custom link and a custom title for your app.
copyright.text_hint: Displayed as your copyright tex in the information section of the app at the bottom of the screen
copyright.link_hint: URL to your website or a project, usewd as a link for the copyright text

android.help: Android smartphones, tablets, Android TV and Android Auto are also supported. Application is native Java, we are not using HTML or hybrid applications.

ios.help: iPhone, iPad applications. Application is native ObjectiveC, we are not using HTML or hybrid applications.

app.request_failed: При загрузке данных приложения произошла ошибка, попробуйте позже или обратитесь в тех. поддержку.
app.title: Application Name
app.description_short_hint: Displayed at Google Play application page. 80 characters max.
app.description_hint: Full description of the application. Displayed in the application store. Try to tell what the application is for and what it allows your listeners to do.
app.website_url_label: Your radiostation website URL. Displayed in the application store and on the application main screen
